title: Direct Memory Access (DMA)
subject: Computer Organization
theory:
Transfering large block of data bypassing CPU. 
DMA Controller takes control of Bus from CPU. 
CPU free to do other work. 
Essential for Disk/Network.

interview_questions.question: Cycle Stealing?
interview_questions.answer: DMA steals a bus cycle from CPU to transfer data word. CPU pauses for that cycle.
